snippet: The nation's largest Latino organizations said they will keep a report card during the immigration debate next year, with plans to mobilize their voters against lawmakers who do not support a comprehensive immigration bill.
abstract: The nation's largest Latino organizations said they will keep a report card during the immigration debate next year, with plans to mobilize their voters against lawmakers who do not support a comprehensive immigration bill.

headline.main: Latino Groups Warn Congress to Fix Immigration, or Else
headline.print_headline: Latino Leaders Warn Congress on Immigration
